pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - pink and green - yarn needle - scissors final size - the diameter is 7 cm and height is 4 cm technical notes *most rounds of the rose are joined with a slip_stitch *this slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *at the end of every round/row is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains for slip_stitch joins outer petals pink row 1 chain 26 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 single_crochet in each chain across 25 sts row 2 chain 1 turn make 1 slip_stitch in the first st make 1 half_double_crochet in the next st chain 1 make 1 double_crochet in the next st chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in the next st make 1 slip_stitch in the next st repeat 5 times 25 sts fasten_off and leave a 30 weave in the starting sew the edges together cm yarn tail yarn tail don t cut off the yarn tail flower base pink round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 1 make 2 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts fasten_off place inside flip over and sew flip up to make the bottom edges the outer petals together leaf green round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 1 make 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 4 chain 6 start in the second chain from the hook make 1 slip_stitch 1 slip_stitch 1 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet and 1 double_crochet skip a st and make a slip_stitch in the next st to lock the leaf in repeat 10 times to make 10 leaves 50 sts fasten_off and leave a 20 place inside sew together cm yarn tail inner
